item.title: Scars of Hope (Short Doc)
item.description:
Scars of Hope (Short Doc)

To be permanently marked with a scar, you must first suffer a wound. However physically or mentally traumatic this process may be, it is important to remember, that with suffering and pain comes strength and enlightenment. The most hopeless and hurtful moments bring life's greatest opportunities for advancement.
